description:
With Ash currently 3 to 1 up against Mandi, it was all up to Golbat to score a comeback in the first round of the Kanto Pok√©mon League.
Ash had stuck with his Kingler that had defeated Mandi`s Exeguttor and Seadra previously.
Golbat used its speed effectively against Kingler and managed to avoid its Vicegrip attack. Once Golbat had found some space it used a Wing Attack which slammed Kingler onto one of the platforms above water-level. Mandi order Golbat to use Mega-Drain but as Golbat got closer, Ash ordered Kingler to use Hyper-Beam, hitting Golbat head-on and eliminating Mandi from the competition in the first round.
name: Golbat (Kom)
